events.message: I recently ordered a pair of headphones but would like to request a refund because the product did not meet my expectations and I no longer want to keep it.
The reported issue has been classified under the Refund cluster due to the customer's request for money back.
The case has been assigned to agent Sarah M. who will assist the customer with refund procedures.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I understand you want to request a refund for your order. I’m here to help you with that.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for the refund request so I can proceed accordingly?
My order number is 123456789. I want a refund because the headphones sound distorted and don’t work as described.
Thank you for the information. We can offer you a full refund after you return the product. I'll send you the prepaid return label via email shortly.
That sounds good, thank you. I will wait for the return label to initiate the shipment back to you.
A return label has been sent to your email address. Once we receive the returned item, the refund will be processed within 5 business days.
We wanted to check if your return shipment has been sent and if you need any further assistance with your refund.
Yes, I shipped the headphones back yesterday. Please let me know once you have processed the refund.
We have received the returned headphones and the refund has been issued to your original payment method. Please allow a couple of days for it to reflect.
We would appreciate if you could take a moment to complete a short survey about your experience with our refund process.
I completed the survey and I’m satisfied with how quickly and smoothly the refund procedure was handled. Thank you.
Thank you for your feedback. We are closing this case now. If you have any other concerns, please do not hesitate to contact us again.
